dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hahahahahaha oh my god, are you serious?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, listen, uh, so Tokayev, right, he's been showing the Slovenian President around.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev and the President of Slovenia Natasa Pirc Musar, who is on an official visit to Kazakhstan, visited the Astana International Financial Center.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, another financial center tour. Riveting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, another financial center tour. Riveting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, this is the AIFC in Astana. They're trying to make it, like, a big deal.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev and the President of Slovenia Natasa Pirc Musar, who is on an official visit to Kazakhstan, visited the Astana International Financial Center.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Big deal." How many companies are we talking? Like, three?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Big deal. How many companies are we talking? Like, three?

dialogue_turns.text: No, no, they said about 3,700 companies from over 80 countries are registered there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, they said about three thousand, seven hundred companies from over eighty countries are registered there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In total, about 3700 companies from more than 80 countries are registered here.

dialogue_turns.text: Registered. Uh huh. And how many are actually doing anything? Just registered.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Registered. Uh huh. And how many are actually doing anything? Just registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They even have, like, their own judicial system, based on case law, which is, uh, a first for Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They even have, like, their own judicial system, based on case law, which is, uh, a first for Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Heads of State were told about the work of the AIFC Court - the first judicial system in Central Asia based on the norms and principles of case law, as well as the International Arbitration Center,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Case law? In that part of the world? Sounds totally legit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Case law? In that part of the world? Sounds totally legit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And get this, the Slovenian president, uh, turns out she's a huge fan of Dimash Kudaibergen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this, the Slovenian president, uh, turns out she's a huge fan of Dimash Kudaibergen.

dialogue_turns.text: I mean, it's a detail, right? Makes it a bit more relatable, maybe.

dialogue_turns.text: Relatable. Or, like, completely distracting from the actual substance, if there even is any.

dialogue_turns.text: It's an official visit, though. Started, uh, March 31st.
